definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: widowhood (Mish. id., Ph. [[אלמת]]) sf. [[בִּגְדֵי אַלְמְנוּתָהּ]] her widow's garments Ge 38:14, Ge 38:19; cstr. [[אַלְמְנוּת חַיּוּת]] 2Sa 20:3 (of David's imprisoned concubines; but text impossible; LXX We [[אַלְמָנוֹת חַיּוֹת]], cf. Dr; Klo thinks gloss); fig. of Jerusalem Is 54:4 [[אַלְמְנוּתַיִח]].
